verbs.description: Eric and Donald Trump Jr. [V: have] bought their aunt 's mansion , an oceanfront estate next to Mar - a - Lago , for $ 18.5 million .
[ARG0: Eric and Donald Trump Jr.] have [V: bought] [ARG1: their aunt 's mansion , an oceanfront estate next to Mar - a - Lago ,] [ARG3: for $ 18.5 million] .
